name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone

reviews.name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a bra that gives good support, creates a nice silhouette under clothes and had comfortable straps. This bra met my needs and also is cute. I like the little bow in the middle. As a bonus, if I bend over, my cup doesn't runneth over.
reviews.title: My favorite molded cup bra!

reviews.name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone
reviews.reviewText: The fit and shape is very flattering! I don't spill out when I bend over. The padding is very light and comfortable. It is a lovely bra!
reviews.title: Wonderful fit and comfort!

reviews.name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone
reviews.reviewText: The straps are so low that I had to take a ribbon and tie the straps together in the back so the bra would be lifted higherand give support.
reviews.title: straps way to low

reviews.name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone
reviews.reviewText: I loved the black one so much I ordered the nude one, too. I wish it came in more colors AND leopard print as it's my new favorite bra!
reviews.title: Fits perfectly!

reviews.name: Maidenform 9452 Comfort Devotion Full Fit T-Shirt Bra Size 36C, Skintone
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't stand wearing, I might of had it o. 5 minutes before taking off and putting my old one on. I shocked of the underwire difference being they were the same brand bra.
reviews.title: wire digs
